document_data.name: Know Protections
document_data.mainbody: '''''Know protections''''' was a basic [[spell]] used by [[bard]]s, [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed a caster to ascertain the defenses and protections of a targeted creature. The spell revealed if the creature had any immunity or resistance to damage, spells or energy. The targeted creature had to be within {{SI|25|ft}} of the caster for the spell to function properly. This distance increased as the caster's skill level grew.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: This spell was commonly used by the [[Church of the Red Knight]] and was described in the reference and spell book ''[[Master Tactician]]''.{{Cite web/Master Tactician}}
